languages.text: В Империуме, где суд вершится мгновенно и без лишних предисловий, даргонусский Дворец Правосудия может по праву считаться экзотикой. Строительство этого уникального сооружения — прихоть эксцентричного Вольного Торговца Бенефаса фон Валанциуса, находившего особое удовольствие в изощренных способах судопроизводства, им же самим и изобретенных.

traits.locale_text: В Империуме, где суд вершится мгновенно и без лишних предисловий, даргонусский Дворец Правосудия может по праву считаться экзотикой. Строительство этого уникального сооружения — прихоть эксцентричного Вольного Торговца Бенефаса фон Валанциуса, находившего особое удовольствие в изощренных способах судопроизводства, им же самим и изобретенных.

languages.text: In the Imperium, where judgement is passed without prior deliberations, the Dargonus Palace of Justice is a truly exotic sight. This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.
languages.original_text: В Империуме, где суд вершится мгновенно и без лишних предисловий, даргонусский Дворец Правосудия может по праву считаться экзотикой. Строительство этого уникального сооружения — прихоть эксцентричного Вольного Торговца Бенефаса фон Валанциуса, находившего особое удовольствие в изощренных способах судопроизводства, им же самим и изобретенных.

traits.locale_text: In the Imperium, where judgement is passed without any deliberations, the Dargonus Palace of Justice is a truly exotic sight. This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed at the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

In the Imperium, where judgement is passed without prior deliberations, the Dargonus Palace of Justice is a truly exotic sight. This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

languages.text: Dargonus Adalet Sarayı, hükümlerin müzakere olmaksızın verildiği İmparatorluk'ta egzotik olarak nitelendirilebilecek bir yerdir. Türünün tek örneği olan bu yer, uydurduğu karmaşık yargılama süreçlerini gözetmekten genellikle keyif duymayan eksantrik Hür Tacir Benefaz von Valancius tarafından bir hevesle inşa ettirilmiştir.
languages.original_text: In the Imperium, where judgement is passed without prior deliberations, the Dargonus Palace of Justice is a truly exotic sight. This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus Adalet Sarayı, hükümlerin müzakere olmaksızın verildiği İmparatorluk'ta egzotik olarak nitelendirilebilecek bir yerdir. Türünün tek örneği olan bu yer, uydurduğu karmaşık yargılama süreçlerini gözetmekten genellikle keyif duymayan eksantrik Hür Tacir Benefaz von Valancius tarafından bir hevesle inşa ettirilmiştir.

languages.text: 帝国では審理なしに裁きが下されることが多い中、ダルゴナス司法宮はまさに異彩を放っていた。この唯一無二の驚異は、風変わりなローグトレーダー、ベネファズ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの気まぐれによって建造されたものである。彼は自分が考案した複雑怪奇な裁判手続きを監督することにめったにない喜びを見出していた。
languages.original_text: In the Imperium, where judgement is passed without prior deliberations, the Dargonus Palace of Justice is a truly exotic sight. This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

traits.locale_text: 帝国では審理なしに裁きが下されることが多い中、ダルゴナス司法宮はまさに異彩を放っていた。この唯一無二の驚異は、風変わりなローグトレーダー、ベネファズ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの気まぐれによって建造されたものである。彼は自分が考案した複雑怪奇な裁判手続きを監督することにめったにない喜びを見出していた。

languages.text: In einem Imperium, in dem Recht ohne vorherige Beratschlagung gesprochen wird, ist der Justizpalast von Dargonus ein wirklich exotischer Anblick. Dieses einzigartige Juwel wurde auf Geheiß des exzentrischen Freihändlers Benefaz von Valancius errichtet, dem es Freude bereitete, komplexen Gerichtsverfahren beizuwohnen, die er selbst eingeführt hatte.
languages.original_text: In the Imperium, where judgement is passed without prior deliberations, the Dargonus Palace of Justice is a truly exotic sight. This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

traits.locale_text: In einem Imperium, in dem Recht ohne vorherige Beratschlagung gesprochen wird, ist der Justizpalast von Dargonus ein wirklich exotischer Anblick. Dieses einzigartige Juwel wurde auf Geheiß des exzentrischen Freihändlers Benefaz von Valancius errichtet, dem es Freude bereitete, komplexen Gerichtsverfahren beizuwohnen, die er selbst eingeführt hatte.

languages.text: Pour l'Imperium, où le verdict est rendu avant les délibérations, le palais de justice de Dargonus fait figure de lieu véritablement exotique. Cette merveille architecturale unique a été bâtie sur un coup de tête par l'excentrique libre-marchand Benefaz von Valancius, qui n'aimait rien tant que d'assister à des procès aux protocoles complexes de sa propre invention.
languages.original_text: In the Imperium, where judgement is passed without prior deliberations, the Dargonus Palace of Justice is a truly exotic sight. This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

traits.locale_text: Pour l'Imperium, où le verdict est rendu avant les délibérations, le palais de justice de Dargonus fait figure de lieu véritablement exotique. Cette merveille architecturale unique a été bâtie sur un coup de tête par l'excentrique libre-marchand Benefaz von Valancius, qui n'aimait rien tant que d'assister à des procès aux protocoles complexes de sa propre invention.

languages.text: En el Imperium, donde se dicta sentencia sin deliberaciones previas, el Palacio de la Justicia de Dargonus es una institución verdaderamente exótica. Esta maravilla única se construyó por antojo del excéntrico Comerciante Independiente Benefaz von Valancius, que disfrutaba supervisando los complejos procedimientos judiciales que él mismo había ideado.
languages.original_text: In the Imperium, where judgement is passed without prior deliberations, the Dargonus Palace of Justice is a truly exotic sight. This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

traits.locale_text: En el Imperium, donde se dicta sentencia sin deliberaciones previas, el Palacio de la Justicia de Dargonus es una institución verdaderamente exótica. Esta maravilla única se construyó por antojo del excéntrico Comerciante Independiente Benefaz von Valancius, que disfrutaba supervisando los complejos procedimientos judiciales que él mismo había ideado.

languages.text: 在帝国之中，审判结果通常都是当场宣判，无需事先商议，而达戈努斯的正义大殿则可以算得上是帝国的奇景。这座独特的审判殿堂由特立独行的贝内法兹·冯·瓦兰修斯下令建造。统治期间，他陶醉于自己设计的繁复审判规定，乐此不疲地欣赏着审判过程。
languages.original_text: In the Imperium, where judgement is passed without prior deliberations, the Dargonus Palace of Justice is a truly exotic sight. This one-of-a-kind marvel was constructed on the whim of the eccentric Rogue Trader Benefaz von Valancius, who found rare pleasure in overseeing convoluted trial proceedings that he himself had invented.

traits.locale_text: 在帝国之中，审判结果通常都是当场宣判，无需事先商议，而达戈努斯的正义大殿则可以算得上是帝国的奇景。这座独特的审判殿堂由特立独行的贝内法兹·冯·瓦兰修斯下令建造。统治期间，他陶醉于自己设计的繁复审判规定，乐此不疲地欣赏着审判过程。
